price: E não digas a respeito de uma cousa: "Por certo, fá-la-ei, amanhã"
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
